{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GP2}} The [[Linksys RT31P2]] appears to be this device with the wireless portion omitted. [http://www.topwifi.cn/bbs/thread-70-1-1.html] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G_series WRT54G series on Wikipedia]
